io.r2dbc.spi

Interface Result.Message

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Result.Segment
    Enclosing interface:
    Result

    public static interface Result.Message
extends Result.Segment
    Message segment reported as result of the statement processing.
    Since:
    0.9
